code: import React from'react';import SearchBar from'./SearchBar/SearchBar';import HotAndNew from'./HotAndNew/HotAndNew';import Categories from'./Categories/Categories';import'../../styles/LandingPage.css';import yeldData from'../../data/yeldData';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var LandingPage=function LandingPage(){var logoUrl=yeldData.landingPage.logoUrl;var bannerData=yeldData.landingPage.bannerData;var randomIdx=Math.floor(Math.random()*8);var bannerSelection=bannerData.banners[randomIdx];var bannerId=bannerSelection.id;var randomBannerUrl="".concat(bannerData.bannerBaseUrl).concat(bannerId).concat(bannerData.bannerExtension);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(randomBannerUrl,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"LandingPage__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage__logo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"LandingPage__logo",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(logoUrl,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/",children:"Yeld"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage__search",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage__banner-info-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"LandingPage__banner-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:bannerSelection.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"LandingPage__banner-owner",children:[bannerData.creditText," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:bannerSelection.owner})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage__hot-and-new",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotAndNew,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LandingPage__categories",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Categories,{})})]})});};export default LandingPage;
